content: this pattern was inspired by valentine s day and the love we share with friends and family this pattern is written so that you can choose the number of stitches that you normally use to make socks i have calculated the stitch pattern for 56 60 64 68 and 72 stitches i am offering this as a free pattern to say thank you to all my you tube followers the pattern has now been updated to include a chart for the lace
